attributes.action: Open Gender Neutral Bathrooms across Stoke on Trent
attributes.background: We think it is really important that Gender Neutral toilets should be introduced everywhere, starting with Stoke on Trent. Our group is called Our A-Gender, look us up on all social media. By doing this we hope to spread awareness of the injustices the LGBT+ community endure.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Public toilets are the responsibility of local councils. 

Stoke-on-Trent City council has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here:

http://www.moderngov.stoke.gov.uk/mgepetitionlistdisplay.aspx

You could start a new petition calling on Parliament to change the law, to place a legal duty on all councils to provide gender neutral public toilets.
